entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this afternoon then to rain later this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain mixed with rain late this evening then to snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets or snow changing to snow near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
